summary: get bound warehouse by shop id
description: get bound warehouse by shop id

query.name: page_no
query.description: Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call. If empty, the default value is 1.

query.name: page_size
query.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), and the "page_no" to start next call. This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data. If empty, the default value is 10. The value should be between 1 and 100.

query.name: category_id
query.description: Category id. Here you need to call the get_category API to retrieve the first-tier category_id.

query.name: stock_levels
query.description: 1-Low Stock & No Sellable stock; 2-Low Stock & To replenish; 3-Low Stock & Replenished; 4-Excess

query.name: whs_region
query.description: The warehouse region you want to query, can only query one region in a request Optional value: BR、CN、ID、MY、MX、TH、TW、PH、VN、SG If do not pass, will get error "block by gateway due to invalid cid"

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: warehouse_item_id
schema.description: Warehouse item id; To indicate an unique item in a warehouse one warehouse item id can match with multiple shop_item_id For Global Item, warehouse_item_id=Global Item id For Local Item, shop_item_id=item_id

schema.name: model_id
schema.description: Warehouse model SKU ID For CB global items, this is equal to the global model_id. For local items, it differs from model_id; use shop_model_id to match the model_id

schema.name: stock_level
schema.description: -1-No need to calculate stock level；0-None；1-Low Stock & No Sellable stock; 2-Low Stock & To replenish; 3-Low Stock & Replenished; 4-Excess

schema.name: ir_approval_qty
schema.description: IR approval but no ASN generated will be included

schema.name: in_transit_pending_putaway_qty
schema.description: ASN in-transitASN pending putaway, Move transfer in transit and Move transfer pending putaway will be included

schema.name: sellable_qty
schema.description: Stocks that are available for sale. This includes warehouse sellable stock, move transfer & rack transfer reserved stock that available for sale, pre-order stock.This quantity may be greater than qty displayed to buyers as it includes stock reserved for upcoming promotions.

schema.name: reserved_qty
schema.description: Stocks reserved by buyer order, RTS. And also includes rack transfer reserved stock that are not available for sale

schema.name: unsellable_qty
schema.description: Stocks in the warehouse that are not available for sale. This includes damaged stocks, isolated stock due to expired/near expiring, in warehouse staging location, missing, etc.

schema.name: excess_stock
schema.description: Number of units that are above 6 days of sales coverage Days.

schema.name: coverage_days
schema.description: Days that the current sellable and pending inbound inventory are expected to last based on current selling speed.

schema.name: in_whs_coverage_days
schema.description: Days that the current sellable inventory are expected to last based on current selling speed.

schema.name: shop_item_id
schema.description: shop_item_id="item_id" in Product Module For Global Item, warehouse_item_id=Global Item id For Local Item, shop_item_id=item_id

schema.name: shop_model_id
schema.description: shop_model_id= item level model_id For Global Item, warehouse_item_id=Global Item id For Local Item, shop_item_id=item_id
